features: 【Angetube Webcam with Mutil-Funtion Ring Light for Better Portrait】 The streamcam built in 3 different colors LED and stepless adjustable brightness to delivery brighter and softer tone light without glare. Single press the touch button to change the color temperatures.A rotating bezel allows for quick, brightness level changes and turn on/off the light without the need to go into software settings.

【Designed for Streaming】 Make a great first impression with fans and impress your friends with Angetube 862Pro’s crisp HD webcam 1080p 60 FPS camera with true-to-life colors.Auto low-light correction kicks in to ensure you stand out, even in poor lighting conditions.Real time auto focus make you never have to worry about adjusting the focal length.Plug and play on Xbox one.Widely compatible with livestream software such as OBS.

【Zoomable Webcam with RF 360° Omnidirectional Remote Control】 Control your video calls with a remote, so even away from the desk you are still in charge. 5X digital zoom below 1080p, Disable video, mute, adjust the FOV, white balance, and more. Adjust the webcamera brightness in Mac OS / Windows without software. This is a great convenience for Mac users.

【Built-in Microphone&Privacy Shutter】 Built-in dual omnidirectional mics with noise cancellation ensure that you get clear audio from every angle.The built-in privacy cover and the remote disable video allows you to enjoy safe digital web life when not in use and prevent hackers from spying on you. It is perfect to provide privacy, security, and peace of mind to individuals, groups, organizations, companies, business, and governments.

【USB A & C Web cam and Wide Compatibility】 The 1080p webcam works with USB A or USB C with included Adapter. Plug and play,No additional driver required.The facecam is compatible with Windows XP/7/8/10/11, Mac OS, Android V5.0 above, Linux,Chrome OS, Ubuntu etc.Perfect for Zoom, Skype, Facetime, Facebook, YouTube, Microsoft Teams, and any other popular video calling software.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Ultra Smooth Streams, No Lag Captures every exciting detail at 1080p 60fps Smart Auto-Focus The webcam is focus on you at all times, reduce lag and enhance your video experience. Sound Great in Any Environment Stay focused with advanced noise-canceling technology that suppresses distracting background sounds. Next page 1 Stepless Dimming Light 2 Smooth 1080p@60fps 3 Smooth Live Streaming 4 Auto-Focus 5 Dual Stereo Mics

Enhanced Control with Angetube Webcam Software You can download software from Angetube’s official website to modify camera property such as exposure, resolution, white balance, etc., and choose different filters to video effects through the software. Adjusted video effects to other video software such as ZOOM, MS Teams, etc. via the “Angetube virtual camera” Adjust Exposure with Remote Control Adjust the exposure with remote control, to get better images and video quality Suitable for MAC/Windows ect. Three colors Stepless Dimming Ring Light Adjust the light color by touch control on the back of the webcam and adjust the brightness by ring knob to meet all your lighting requirements while streaming or video chatting. RF 360° Omnidirectional Remote Control Control your video calls with a remote, so even away from the desk you are still in charge. 5X digital zoom below 1080p, Disable video, mute, adjust the FOV, white balance, and more. TIPS: When using for the first tine, openthe battery cover and take out thebattery insulating paper. The resolution of zoorn in andzoom out is lower than 108OP, such as 720p，Please adjust the resolution to lower than 1080p. The buttons of up, down, left and right only work after zooing in.
Previous page Next page 1 5X Digital Zoom 2 Adjustable Field of View 3 Adjust Exposure 4 Privacy Protection 5 One-Touch Mute

Updated Slim Connector Easy to set-up, Plug and play, No driver needed. With included jack adapter, the 1080p webcam with light compatible with USB A and USB C. Flexible Clip You can place the webcam on top of monitors, TVs, or on almost any surface with ease, even mount it to a tripod, you can get any angle as you need. Wide compatibility The webcam compatible with a host of different devices and software including Xbox, Zoom, Skype, OBS, Teams etc. Great for Meeting, Gaming, Streaming. Automatic Low Light Correction Equipped with automatic white balance, Delivery clear videos even in dim light with automatic light Correction.Never worry about the quality of image.

No response when pressing any button on the remote control? Check if the insulation paper is removed, replace the batteries. If the issue persists, contact seller for reprogramming. Why do other buttons on the remote control work, but the zoom in and out buttons don't? This model only supports zooming when the resolution is less than 1080P. Please try zooming in and out after switching the resolution. If you have any further questions, please contact the seller's support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little cam for online meetings etc.
reviews.reviewText: It today's world with so many of us working remotely, it is important to have a good reliable camera for those meetings. I was tired of setting up lights every time I had a zoom meeting so I decided to try this camera with a built in ring light. I was glad I did. The camera performs perfectly and with the ring light, I no longer have to fiddle with multiple devices when it is time for a meeting. The picture quality is amazing as well. Far superior to the built in camera on my laptop. The remote is a handy device for adjusting zoom etc without reaching. All in all, a great device. It has a built in mike, which I have not needed to use as I use a wireless mike during my meetings, but if it is of the same quality as the rest of the camera I am certain it works great. There are cheaper cameras you can buy, but this one ticks all the boxes and is worth a little extra

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with product, customer service superb.
reviews.reviewText: This product meets my needs perfectly. Clear picture and audio, zoom funtion, ring light, color correction all work flawlessly. Using for Zoom and other meeting software.Customer service is superb! I needed help when I moved the camera from one computer to another and Dong at customer service always responded quickly and sorted thing out for me.I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good camera for the price, but needs a few improvements
reviews.reviewText: This is a decent camera for the price-point, but there are two, possibly three, improvements that need to be made.1. Privacy shutter is hard to see.There is a tiny slider switch on the camera itself that you can move in order to engage the privacy cover. This switch, and the privacy cover itself, are difficult to see. This makes it hard to tell if the privacy shutter is covering the lens or not.I think they should paint the switch and the cover (or even just the cover) a much lighter color in order to let you easily tell whether it is engaged or not. It's a small change, but would greatly improve the camera.2. The ring light switch lacks a stopper. You rotate it and it goes from off to dim to fully lit to off to dim...etc... This means that if you are trying to turn the light off, you can't really tell if you've turned it off or just dimmed it. It also means if you try to turn it off, you are very likely to rotate past off and into fully bright light blasting you in the face when you least expect it.There should be a full stopper or even just something that provides tactile feedback letting you know the light is off. It's another small change, but would really improve the product3. Autofocus. Don't get me wrong, the autofocus works decently, but depending on the room lighting, it may constantly refocus. I found I have to have a decent amount of room lighting and not just the camera's ring light, in order to avoid it continuously refocusing.Those are just my three suggestions on how this product could be easily improved (well, the first two at least).Don't get me wrong though. It's a good camera for the price. You get a built-in light that is dimmable (with a lot of flexibility and not just two or three stages of dimming). You also get a remote that will allow you to zoom in. The remote even lets you temporarily shut off the video, sort of like a software privacy shutter that resets whenever you restart your recording/web conf session.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT WEB CAM
reviews.reviewText: I AM NOT SURE WHY THERE ARE SOME NEGATIVE REVIEWS. I HAVE ONLY HAD IT FOR A COUPLE OF DAYS BUT THE INSTALL WAS EASY. I HAD TO GET AN USB EXTENSION TO WORK FOR MY DESKTOP WHICH WAS HARD TO FIND LOCALLY (WLAMART DOES NOT CARRY THEM ANYMORE). I TESTED THE DEVICE WITH 2 PEOPLE. ONE WAS LOCALLY AND ONE ACROSS COUNTRY. BOTH THE VIDEO AND AUDIO WAS HIGH QUALITY PER THE RECIPIENTS. I WAS CONCERNED ABOUT THE AUDIO SINCE THE SOUND GRAPH IN THE DEVICES AND PRINTERS IN THE CONTROL PANEL ONLY SHOWED ONE BAR ON THE GRAPH WHEN I WAS TESTING THE DEVICE. BOTH OF MY RECIPIENTS SAID THE SOUND WAS AUDIBLE AND CLEAR. THE CAM IS MOUNTED ON MY MONITOR WHICH IS ABOUT 24" FROM WHERE I SIT AT MY DESK. THE REMOTE WORKS FOR ALL FUNCTONS. NOTE THAT YOU DO NEED TO REMOVE THE BATTERY COVER AND BATTERY TO REMOVE THE PLASTIC PEICE TO ACTIVATE THE BATTERY FOR THE REMOTE. I WILL REPORT IF I HAVE ISSUES GOING FORWARD. HOWEVER, IT WORKS ON DEMAND WITH MST VIDEO CONFERENCING. THIS IS ON A PC NOT A MAC. IT'S A LITTLE PRICIER THAN A LOT OF OTHER CAMS BUT A LOT MORE FUNTIONS. THE LIGHT SETTING IS MANUAL BUT OKAY ONCE SET WHERE YOU LIKE IT. THERE IS NO WAY TO TURN THE DEVICE OFF ACCEPT THROUGH DISABLING IN THE CONTROL PANEL, DISCONNECTING THE USB OR TURNING OFF THE COMPUTER. THE LENS SHEILD IS MANUAL AS WELL. IT WOULD BE NICE IF THERE WAS AN ON/OFF SWITCH AT THE DEVICE. IN SPITE OF THIS, I AM VERY PLEASED WITH THIS CAM SO FAR.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great camera with sharp picture. Easy to set up and love how the light ring is easy to operate and has several settings for different types of lighting. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This camera is difficult to set up and use, mostly because of the lame software that controls it.
reviews.reviewText: This camera is ok, but not worth the money. The remote control is the great feature I wanted, but it won't zoom unless you lower the resolution. The software program that comes with it is hard to figure out and it must be activated, which is stupid and a hassle. Also, the software program is pretty lame and you can't edit your videos or pictures. Actually, the only good features of this camera is the built in light and being able to change the field of view. Shop around. I'm sure you can get a better deal than this. I'm going to keep it, but I regret buying this particular camera. The main issue is the poor software.

reviews.reviewText: Love the quality for the price

reviews.reviewText: It’s a good product. Instructions a little confusing and tiny for my old eyes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Alles perfect en de afstandsbediening is top

Réceptionnée rapidement, installation on ne peux plus simple (juste à brancher sur le pc et hop !). Testé en appel via Messenger, la qualité est superbe. Je n'ai pas testé le son car j'ai un microcasque exprès.Anneau lumineux testé et puissant ! La lumière peut heureusement être réglée parfaitement grâce à l'anneau variateur. Je n'ai pas encore testé la télécommande fournie avec par contre, ni l'auto focus, mais il a l'air de se faire tout seul car aucun réglage à faire lors de l'appel vidéo :)

reviews.reviewTitle: Angetube Webcam: Qualità Eccezionale a un Prezzo Imbattibile
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Ho recentemente acquistato la Angetube Streaming Webcam e sono rimasto estremamente soddisfatto di questo prodotto. Voglio condividere alcuni dei punti salienti che rendono questa webcam un'ottima scelta per chiunque cerchi un dispositivo di alta qualità a un prezzo ragionevole.- Qualità dei Materiali e dei Video: La webcam offre una qualità video eccezionale con una risoluzione di 1080P a 60FPS, ideale per lo streaming e le videochiamate. L'autofocus integrato assicura che l'immagine rimanga nitida e chiara in ogni situazione, rendendo ogni interazione online più professionale e coinvolgente.- Controllo Remoto Multifunzione: Una delle caratteristiche più notevoli è la presenza di un telecomando che permette di regolare lo zoom, l'esposizione e di spegnere o riaccendere il video e l'audio. Questo offre un livello di comodità e flessibilità notevole, specialmente durante le lunghe sessioni di streaming o conferenze online.- Rapporto Qualità/Prezzo: Dopo lunghe ricerche, posso affermare che questa webcam offre un rapporto qualità/prezzo eccellente. È un investimento che consiglio vivamente a chi cerca un prodotto affidabile senza spendere una fortuna.- Software Personalizzabile: La webcam viene fornita con il software per PC "Angietube", che permette di personalizzare ulteriormente diverse impostazioni. Questo software aggiunge un ulteriore livello di personalizzazione che può essere cruciale per gli utenti più esigenti.- Light Ring Regolabile: La webcam è dotata di una light ring con luminosità e calore della luce regolabili. Questo è estremamente utile per migliorare la qualità del video in condizioni di luce variabili, assicurando sempre la migliore illuminazione possibile.- Otturatore per la Privacy: Per coloro che sono preoccupati per la sicurezza e la privacy, questa webcam include un otturatore incorporato che può essere facilmente attivato quando la webcam non è in uso. Questo fornisce un ulteriore livello di sicurezza e tranquillità.In conclusione, la Angetube Streaming Webcam è una scelta eccellente per chiunque cerchi una webcam di alta qualità con molteplici funzionalità avanzate. Il suo design intuitivo, unito a una qualità dell'immagine superiore e a un prezzo accessibile, la rende una delle migliori opzioni sul mercato.

reviews.reviewTitle: Funciona bien, tiene buena calidad de imagen.
reviews.reviewText: Funciona en Windows.Funciona con el Sistema O. de Google en mi Chromebook, como podéis ver en una de las fotos.Viene con un adaptador USB-C a USB normal, que podrías usar en un smartphone con OTG, o como hice yo, con mi chromebook con tomas USB-CTiene además su propia app de Angetube para Windows, que entrando a su Web en el chat, ellos te dan la clave para activar todas las funciones.Tiene zoom manual y automático.Si usas el zoom manual con cualquier app, puedes hacer fotos incluso de tarjetas, con buena calidad como podéis ver en otra de las fotos.También tiene rosca para usar con palo selfie.Lleva un botón trasero para modificar el tipo de luz que emite, de blanco a cálido, y en la rosca frontal, regulas la intensidad de la luz led, que tiene bastante potencia.Tiene un botón para ocultar el objetivo también en la parte frontal.Lleva micrófonos incorporados, que a 2m de distancia todavía captan la voz.Si la usas para hacer fotos, para poder usar el zoom y hacer encuadres, tienes que bajar la resolución a HD.Con el mando a distancia, en vídeoconferencias o grabación de vídeo, puedes hacer zoom y hacer que aparezca en pantalla, sólo la parte que tú quieres que aparezca, usando para ello el mando a distancia para mover y encuadrar la imagen.También puedes modificar la luminosidad del objetivo de la cámara con el mando además de con la aplicación con la que la estés usando, además de silenciar el microfóno, o de silenciar la emisión de imagen.En resumen, buena cámara.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good Camera with a remote. Has a great picture and holds great frame rates. Another thing I like is the Angetube software it works really well and gives some nice filters for better picture.Definitely worth it's price.
